widget.type: NEW INTERNS  |  NEW FULL TIME EMPLOYEES
widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

config.title: Emilio Barrera
config.description: My name is Emilio Barrera, and I'm a gamer who loves programming, dogs, cats, karate, chess, and every single geek-thing you can think of, except Star Wars and TLOTR (I haven't watched them yet). I'm open-minded, and even if I disagree with people's points of view, I do respect each of them.
